settings.title: Become An Affiliate
settings.subtitle: Become a B.Draddy affiliate and help us spread the good vibes while earning a commission. We’d call that a win-win.

settings.rte:
DETAILS

  • 30 Day Cookie Tracking
  • Opportunity for special promotions and collaborations!
  • Proactive Affilate Management
  • Up to date catalog for your use

Each time your visitors click through an affiliate link to www.bdraddy.com and makes a purchase, you'll earn a commission*. Through our affiliate tracking provider, Impact Radius, you’ll be able to easily access creative assets and performance metrics to help you optimize your efforts.

*Please see Service Agreement when you apply

settings.title: Generous Incentives
settings.text: Competitive commission on net sales, plus performance-based increases and bonus opportunities.

settings.title: Insider Access
settings.text: Be the first to know about promotions, new product launches, and sales opportunities with our weekly newsletter.

settings.title: Dedicated Support
settings.text: Our in-house affiliate management team is here to assist you along the way.
